snippet: New Yorkers turned to Twitter in the days after Nora Ephron’s death on Tuesday to say a thousand different ways: There was no one quite like her.
abstract: Top Twitter trends this week include posts reflecting on the death of filmmaker and author Nora Ephron.
lead_paragraph: New Yorkers turned to Twitter in the days after Nora Ephron’s death on Tuesday to say a thousand different ways: There was no one quite like her.

headline.print_headline: Mourning the Wit And the Woman
headline.seo: On Twitter, Mourning the Wit and the Wisdom of Nora Ephron
headline.main: Mourning the Wit and the Woman
